titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the William H. Beierwaltes papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Chief of division of nuclear medicine at University Hospital of the University of Michigan. Beierwaltes was first physician to inject nuclear medicine antibody in a cancer patient for radioimmunotherapy.
archdesc.scopecontent: Collected materials include copies of research papers written on the development of use of radioactive iodine and the radioimmunotherapy of cancer.
